name: SinricPro_Generic
keywords: communication, sinric, sinric pro, alexa, iot, websockets
description: Library for https://sinric.pro - simple way to connect your device to Alexa. For ESP8266, ESP32, SAMD, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, Teensy, SAM DUE, etc using W5x00/ENC28J60 Ethernet or WiFiNINA
